title: CU Boulder Class of 1964 50th Reunion Bench
description: Bench to be placed on the CU Boulder campus with a plaque designating it as a gift from the Class of 1964 (exact material and location still to be determined).
marketingContent: Bench to be placed on the CU Boulder campus with a plaque designating it as a gift from the Class of 1964 (exact material and location still to be determined).
